originalText.text: My property manager Jason is great. Typical NYC apartment issues, nothing unique to this property, but when I tell him about it he is on top of it and communicative. Very happy with the support provided when asked.

text.text: My property manager Jason is great. Typical NYC apartment issues, nothing unique to this property, but when I tell him about it he is on top of it and communicative. Very happy with the support provided when asked.

originalText.text: The absolute worst management I have ever dealt with, I would give them less than 1 star if possible. They bought the property I had been staying at for 3 years prior.  They waited 3 weeks until 10pm on the day before the rent was due to make first contact with payment instructions and ask for the rent immediately or pay a late fee.  The upstairs tenants they moved in flooded the bath tub which poured 100 gallons through my ceiling, they did not offer to help with fixing anything and my ceiling was falling down afterwards and ruined important items of mine.  They do not have any regard for the law, or just choose not to abide by them and hope you do not sue.  Do not be fooled by the obviously paid positive reviews, these people do not deserve your money.

originalText.text: I have been renting with them for 4 years now and my experience has been very positive. The drastic change that the management team has done is fantastic. Sonny the property manager is so attentive. Very happy with Magnum Real Estate group.

text.text: I have been renting with them for 4 years now and my experience has been very positive. The drastic change that the management team has done is fantastic. Sonny the property manager is so attentive. Very happy with Magnum Real Estate group.

originalText.text: My daughter rented property from magnum management on Forest Avenue on the West End of Norristown  they weekly knocked on my daughter‘s door demanding money from her. In the end they wind up evicted my daughter. While my daughter was renting from magnum management she had washer and dryer hook up with no washer and dryer I had a brand new washer and dryer that I bought from Aaron’s and made payments until completely paid off . They evicted my daughter and refuse to give me my washer and dryer. I pleated with the manager Vj to please give me back my property. I had to take him to court and in his lease it showed that appliances came with the house so I lost the case and lost my brand new washer and dryer. He pretty much stole my washer and dryer from me because my daughter owed him an outstanding balance. I showed the judge proof from the guy who took it from my house and brought it to my daughters house, I also showed Vj proof although he knew the washer and dryer did not belong to him and I show proof that the same serial number make and model was on the receipt that I received from Aarons  I still lost my washer and dryer to Vj and it’s still remains in the house on Forest Avenue Across the street from Stewart middle school. I would never recommend anyone to rent from this property management.

originalText.text: Daritza is such a employee, she did an amazing job helping me and was able to answer all my questions. Sonny is a great property manager..
